attributes.action: publicly thank Heather Brooke for her work on FOI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister should thank Heather Brooke for her tireless campaign to have the expenses of MP's published. Further more, he understands that an employer has the right to know exactly what an employee claims in expenses.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
